name: Mrs. Claus’ Candy Soap:  4 oz
description:
Use:  Normal to dry skin 

Ingredients: Olive, coconut, palm oils, lye, Christmas spices FO, enriched with Jojoba Oil. Wax color.

The combination of Olive, Coconut and Palm oils create a soap that is a very good moisturizer, attracts external moisture, holds the moisture close to the skin and forms a barrier that prevents loss of internal moisture. This is a hard bar with wonderful lathering quality. It has been enriched with Jojoba Oil that helps us maintain normal functions while allowing the skin a chance to repair and rebalance.

name: Christmas Tree Castile Soap:  4 oz
description:
Use:  Normal to dry skin 

Ingredients:  Olive, Coconut, Palm oils, lye, Pine needles FO.

The combination of Olive, Coconut and Palm oils create a soap that is a very good moisturizer, attracts external moisture, holds the moisture close to the skin and forms a barrier that prevents loss of internal moisture. This is a hard bar with wonderful lathering quality. It has been enriched with Jojoba Oil that helps us maintain normal functions while allowing the skin a chance to repair and rebalance.

name: 100% Olive Oil Soap - 4oz
description:
Made with 100% Extra Virgin Olive Oil.  Very rich soap for extra dry skin.

A very good moisturizer, attracts external moisture, holds it close to the skin, and forms a breathable film to prevent loss of internal moisture.  Olive Oil does not block the natural functions of the skin while performing its own.  The skin is able to continue sweating, releasing sebum, and shedding dead skin.  These qualities provides for an excellent product to care for your skin.

name: All Spices Soap: 4oz
description:
Use:  Normal to oily skin 

Ingredients: Soy Bean , olive and coconut oils, lye, enriched with Jojoba oil, Cinnamon Clove, Nutmeg and Ginger Powder, Clove Essential Oil, Wax color

Soy Bean in combination with Olive, Coconut and Palm oils create a mild soap with some moisturizer that creates a barrier that prevents loss of internal moisture.  It has been enriched with Jojoba Oil that helps us maintain normal functions while allowing the skin a chance to repair and rebalance.

name: Angel Castile Soap: 4oz
description:
Use:  Normal to dry skin 

Ingredients: Olive, coconut, palm oils, lye, Angel FO, enriched with Shea Butter, natural coloring.


The combination of Olive, Coconut and Palm oils create a soap that is a very good moisturizer, attracts external moisture, holds the moisture close to the skin and forms a barrier that prevents loss of internal moisture. This is a hard bar with wonderful lathering quality. It has been enriched with Shea Butter which is gently enough for babies and people with sensitive skin.  It soothes and softens dry, chapped skin, while nourishing all skin types. Angel Fragrance Oil is very highly appreciated for its unique touch. This scent conjures up images of playgrounds, cotton candy, and childhood experiences. Categorized as an oriental floral-gourmand. This is a very feminine, wonderful scent!
